description:
Freeware Visual File Comparison Tool

ExamDiff is a freeware Windows tool for visual file comparison. It is quick and very simple to use, and has a number of convenient features that many users have been asking for a long time from a file comparison tool.
New features:
- Windows 11 support
- Diff combo box colors and focus highlighting
- When diff combo box has focus, mouse wheel scrolling navigates through differences (the same is achieved by using Shift + Mouse Wheel even if the combo box is out of focus)
